section.title: Pay employees and contractors
section.p: Distribute wages to contractors and employees, and generate W2 and 1099 forms for tax season. Workers' compensation coverage through AP Intego. Priority customer support, direct from Wave headquarters

section.title: Direct deposit
section.p: Dispurse payments directly into the employees’ bank accounts, quickly and securely. Less work for you, and your team will love it.

section.title: Automatic filings and payments
section.p: Wave’s payroll tax service can automatically pay and file state and federal payroll taxes for businesses residing in CA, FL, IL, NY, NC, TN, TX, VA, and WA. (Coming soon to more states.)

section.title: Automatic payroll journal entries
section.p: Payroll software by Wave is easily connected with the rest of your Wave account to reduce time spent on manual bookkeeping.

section.title: Self-service pay stubs and tax forms
section.p: Employees can log into their account to manually retrieve pay stubs and W2s, and manage their contact and banking information.

section.title: Protect your team with workers' comp
section.p: Pay for what you use and simplify your annual audits with workers' compensation built for small business owners. Great for seasonal businesses; put employees on hold any time for free.
